INGLES

Convert videos of any format to DVD ConvertXtoDVD (formerly DivXtoDVD Converter) is a utility to convert VSO easily and conveniently your videos to DVD format. Perhaps the best thing is that ConvertXtoDVD is able to do everything by himself , turning and even recording the final result to DVD (if you have installed CopyToDVD ) . ConvertXtoDVD is not limited to DivX, but also can convert MPEG , Quicktime , XviD and Windows Media Video ( WMV) files. So what are you waiting for? Download ConvertXtoDVD and enjoy your videos lying comfortably on your couch. ConvertXtoDVD supports the following formats : DivX , XviD , MOV , VOB , MPEG4 , MP4 , AVI , DV , WMV , AC3 , DTS , PCM, OGG , MP3
